content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Coal Mining Operation at (-14, -15)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (24.0, -15.0)
- Wooden chest at (23.5, -16.5) storing coal (256 units)

###Iron Ore Mining Operation at (-14, 23)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-14.0, 23.0)
- Wooden chest at (-14.5, 21.5) storing iron ore (209 units)

###Copper Ore Mining and Processing at (20, 20)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (20.0, 20.0) mining copper ore
- Wooden chest at (20.5, 21.5) storing copper ore (259 units)
- Another wooden chest at (22.5, 21.5) storing copper ore (393 units)
- Stone furnace at (24.0, 20.0)
- Burner inserter at (22.5, 20.5) configured to move ore from chest to furnace
- Burner inserter at (24.5, 18.5) configured to move processed plates
- Output wooden chest at (24.5, 17.5) storing copper plates (53 units)

###Unused Furnace Group at (-10, 20)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at (-11.0, 20.0) and (-9.0, 20.0)

ERROR TIPS

###Furnace Fuel Management Issues
- Check furnace fuel capacity before attempting to insert more coal
- The furnace at (24.0, 20.0) has reached maximum fuel capacity (50/50)

###Inserter Placement and Configuration
- Ensure inserters are properly aligned with their pickup and drop positions
- Verify inserter rotation matches the intended material flow direction
- The agent had to adjust inserter positions multiple times to get proper alignment between chest and furnace

###Resource Flow Issues
- Despite having proper infrastructure setup, the furnace shows NO_INGREDIENTS status
- Verify the complete path of resources from mining drill to chest to furnace
- Ensure inserters have proper pickup and drop positions to transfer materials effectively
